title: What's Wrong With This Name?
body: I wanted to make my username Arsenes Cane, but the game says I can't? Is it because it has "arse" in there somewhere? It's based off of the gentleman thief Ars√©ne Lupin (and his appearance in Persona 5). I purchased a Riot Point card to change it (since my parents don't want me putting their credit card number out there) and I just want my in game name to be Arsenes Cane. Q.Q

replies.body:
SPOILERS!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Jk Jk.....yea most likely the 'Arse' in Arsene is preventing you from using that name. No worries, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we should be able to get that name changed for ya ^_^!

Fantastic thank you! But one more thing: when I go to submit the ticket, it logs me out and it doesn't give me a normal log in when I click on the log in button(s). [This](http://i.imgur.com/UpP3u0j.png) is the image I get. Clicking on the "Can't Login to Support?" Just takes me back to the beginning. So just a little more help please

!!!!EDIT!!!! I fixed it I submitted the ticket thank you
